rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: Serves as the entrance with a small waiting area, following Vastu principles for welcoming energy.

rooms.name: Common Living Area
rooms.description: Open space with floor-to-ceiling windows that allow natural light. Incorporates Kerala-style woodwork and tiled flooring, arranged in a central location.

rooms.name: Kitchen & Dining
rooms.description: Functional kitchen with adjoining dining area. Utilizes local materials and compact design to suit budget constraints, while ensuring optimal natural light from windows.

rooms.name: Guest Room / Study
rooms.description: Multi-purpose room serving as guest room or study. Features floor-to-ceiling windows and Kerala-style decor, suitable for flexible use.

rooms.name: Utility Room & Storage
rooms.description: Small utility area including storage solutions. Efficient design to maximize space without compromising on traditional aesthetic.

features: Direct access to the garden area

overall_principles: Orientation is aligned with Vastu to ensure natural light and energy flow.
Rooms are strategically placed according to directional strengths: Living area in the south, kitchen in south-west, utility on west.
vastu_overview.garden_integration: Large garden at the rear (eastern side) enhances relaxation and provides privacy. Garden pathways designed to maximize use of space within budget constraints.
